instructions: Go to your profile page ( ) in Instagram. On iOS, tap the menu button , then the settings gear icon ( ). On Android, tap the menu button ( ). Select Blocked Accounts (you may have to scroll). Tap any blocked user to get to their profile, where you can unblock them using the instructions above.

Tap the Instagram Direct icon (a paper airplane) in Instagram for iOS or Android. Tap + to start a new message . Write your own Instagram username under To . Select your own Instagram account from the list below. If you're using Instagram for iOS, tap Next . Write @ followed directly by the username of the account you wish to unblock. For example, for the user barackobama, type: @barackobama . Tap Send . Now tap the highlighted username in the message you just sent. Open the user profile menu ( on iOS and on Android). Select Unblock from the menu that has appeared and confirm your choice. If the person has changed their username since you blocked them, you will not be able to unblock them using this method.
